oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adams, Daniel, 1885 September 19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Daniel Adams, dated January 18th, 1884. Illustrates the first page of the document. Adams’ will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on September 19th, 1885. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adams family
